name: Dr. Anna Reynolds
bio: Dr. Anna Reynolds is a board-certified psychologist with over 10 years of experience helping individuals overcome anxiety and depression using evidence-based therapies.

name: Dr. Michael Stevens
bio: Dr. Michael Stevens dedicates his practice to helping families and couples navigate complex relationship challenges with compassion and evidence-based strategies.

name: Dr. Emily Carter
bio: Focusing on integrating mindfulness with traditional therapy techniques, Dr. Emily Carter provides support for clients looking to manage stress and cultivate mental well-being.

name: Dr. Oliver Hughes
bio: With extensive experience addressing trauma and PTSD, Dr. Oliver Hughes employs a compassionate, client-centered approach to guide individuals through their healing process.

name: Dr. Sophia Liu
bio: Specializing in the needs of younger clients, Dr. Sophia Liu offers tailored support for children and teenagers navigating emotional and educational challenges.
